full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks!

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Both,

I have a few more changes to be actioned if possible, let me know if there are any issues. Have attached a word doc with the changes here.

I have also noticed a strange link that has been embedded on the website on this page: https://ludahus.com.au/delivery-and-returns/. When you click 'logging into your account' it takes you to a foreign website to purchase an online slot game. Are we able to check that everything is okay in the back end and the site hasn't been compromised?



Georgie Morris

ECOMMERCE & MARKETING MANAGER



E: georgie.morris@ludahus.com

P: 0434 435 602

W: ludahus.com.au
Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel & Heath, Hope you're both well! Happy for this to be actioned after New Year, just wanted to send through while it was on my mind. Really happy with how everything is looking online! I have been able to make most changes needed myself, however I am struggling with the Wash&Walk Page on mobile. If you were able to help with the below that would be great.
  • Can we remove the text 'each box contains 5 tiles' from the quantity selector, as well as 'inc all taxes'. Are we able to align this content so it is responsive on mobile.
  • Can we align the colour swatch text so it is centred under the swatch, Almond Frost in particular looks a bit funny.
  • At the moment you have to fill out the 'calculate by room size' module so you can add boxes to your cart, can we please remove this as a required field and have it as optional.
  • The Room size calculation module isn't responsive on mobile, are we able to adjust so it is?
Thanks for your help! Georgie Morris ECOMMERCE & MARKETING MANAGER E: georgie.morris@ludahus.com P: 0434 435 602 W: ludahus.com.au

Hi Joel,

Sorry to bother you ~ have any of the settings been changed in WP? I'm not able to edit any of the pages with Elementor. I was making a few changes prior to the change over and it was fine and since the change over I'm not able to make changes.

Georgie Morris

ECOMMERCE & MARKETING MANAGER

W: ludahus.com.au

Hi Heath,

I hope you're having a lovely week 😊

I just wanted to check in and see how things were going. I had a look in the back end and it looks like the colours are linked when selected on the product page which is great!

Only thing I notices is that the Granite and Walnut colours need to be swapped.

Are we able to publish these updates to the live theme now? Thanks again for your help.

Georgie Morris

ECOMMERCE & MARKETING MANAGER

Hi Heath,

Thanks so much for your help on this one.

I've been able to jump in and make a lot of the tweaks myself, the only ones I haven't been able to tackle are:


  1. Can we remove the High Pile / Low Pile selection on the product page?

  2. Product page: Can the product colour choice link with the image, ie when 'Graphite' is selected, the graphite product image shows.


I think that's all for now,
